original: Lundbom, Helge Fredrik, kiommi-nister, Todderöd, f. 16/9/03 i Grebbe-stad, Gbgs o. Boh. 1., av 0’S’kar L. o. Hilda Jakobsson. — Stud:ex. i Udde-vailla 25, fil. kand. li Lund 27, teol. kand. 30, prakt. teol. prov ’S. å., präst-V. f. Karlstads stift 30. Pastorsadj. o. v. past. i Färgelanda, v. kommin. i Ödeborg, kyrkoadj. i By 32, v. pastor i Kila, kommin. i Askum fr. 34. Led. av kyrkoråd, v. ordf. i past :kyrko-stämma, Näsets kapellstift., ordf. i kyrkofulilm. o. i skolstyr.
translated: Lundbom, Helge Fredrik, clergyman, Todderöd, b. 16/9/03 in Grebbestad, Gothenburg and Bohuslän 1st district, son of Lars and Hilda Jakobsson. — Graduated from secondary school in Uddevalla in 1925, Bachelor of Arts at Lund University in 1927, Bachelor of Theology in 1930, practical theological examination in the same year, temporary vicar of Karlstad Diocese in 1930. Assistant pastor and vicar in Färgelanda, assistant curate in Ödeborg, church assistant in By in 1932, temporary pastor in Kila, curate in Askum from 1934. Member of the church council, vice chairman of the parish church meeting, Näsets chapel diocese, chairman of the church building committee and the school board.
